AutoVM – VPS, VDS, Game VPS – Various locations and 30% discount!

autovm, ddos, game server, hdd, nvme, raid10, ssd, vds, VPS December 18, 2019 @ 7:23 am, by Frank Williams

AutoVM recently sent us some offers specifically for the LEB community, complete with coupon codes!
As their first opening offer here, customers can use code LEB2020 for 30% lifetime discount on all products! Also DDoS protection is included for free on every plan.

With the OVH services you’ll get a custom DDoS control panel and attack notifications to Discord and/or E-mail. They are constantly expanding this functionality so expect more to come in the future.
They let us know that they only offer high-end hardware with dedicated resources at a very competitive price. What makes them stand out is that they will go to great lengths to make their customers happy.

Their WHOIS is public and you can find their ToS/Legal Docs here. They accept Credit card (Stripe), Paypal, Bitpay, Bancontact, Ideal, Sofort, Giropay and przelewy24 as payment methods.

Here’s what they had to say: 

“We’re an IT company and have been hosting our own web services for years. We still host game servers for fun and have our own community.

In the past we’ve dealt with a lot of bad providers and security challenges like DDoS attacks. Now we want to share our experience and start a hosting business ourselves so our customers can profit from our knowledge and experience.

Our main goal is to provide excellent services with a lot of freedom and great support.”

Here’s the offers: 

Los Angeles Anti-DDoS VPS

  • 1 Dedicated vCPU E-2136 (Base@3.3GHz,Turbo@4.5GHz)
  • 4GB ECC RAM
  • 60GB SSD RAID1 HDD
  • 2 GBps premium network – LACP load balanced
  • 2 TB clean traffic included, any additional TB €5/mo (this is just what Voxility is charging us)
  • Location: Los Angeles Coresite
  • 1x IPv4 address
  • 1x IPv6 address
  • DDoS Protection up to 1 TBps, enable layer 7 through ticket
  • Instant setup! (Depends on stock and fraud check)
  • Only €14/mo. using code LEB2020. (30% discount)
  • [ORDER HERE]

Frankfurt Power VDS

  • 1 Dedicated vCPU E-2288G (Base@3.7GHz,Turbo@5GHz)
  • 4GB ECC RAM
  • 40 GB NVMe RAID1 HDD
  • 1 GBps guaranteed network w/unmetered bandwidth (fair use)
  • 1x IPv4 address (more possible, open ticket)
  • 1x IPv6 /80 Subnet
  • Anti DDoS Pro control panel (Using OVH API so you can create your own rules)
  • Instant setup! (Depending on stock/fraudcheck)
  • Upgrades possible
  • DDoS notifications to Discord and/or E-Mail
  • Only €7/mo. using code LEB2020 (30% discount)
  • [ORDER HERE]

Game VPS (Singapore, Frankfurt, Montreal)

  • 1 vCPU Core i7-6700/7700K@4.0/4.2GHz
  • 2GB RAM
  • 20GB NVMe SSD Disk
  • 1 GBps uplink
  • Unmetered bandwidth (Singapore excepted)
  • Anti-DDoS Game & Anti-DDoS Pro
  • (Game) Anti-DDoS Control Panel
  • 1 IPv4 Address (If you need more please open ticket)
  • Free /80 IPv6 Subnet
  • Only €10.50/mo. with code LEB2020 (30% discount)
  • [ORDER HERE]
